hadiths.text: It was narrated the Qatadah said:"I heard Abu Mijlaz say: 'I asked Ibn 'Abbas something about the Jimar, and he said: I do not know, the Messenger of Allah stoned it with six or seven

chapter.ara-name: باب عَدَدِ الْحَصَى الَّتِي يُرْمَى بِهَا الْجِمَارُ
chapter.eng-name: The Number of Pebbles To bE Thrown At the Jimar.
